## Government Tender Announcement

### Notice for Standing Offer for Socks

#### Purpose
The Government of Canada's Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Requisition for Standing Offer (RFSO) 21C31-236496 (WS3836953084) for the supply of work socks for male corrections officers. 

#### Key Information

| Details | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3836953084 |
| **Publication Date** | July 10, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | October 31, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time) |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | July 4, 2023 |

#### Delivery and Tender Requirements

* Suppliers must provide a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply of work socks.
* The socks must be in a blend of wool/nylon, grey and in various sizes.

#### Technical Specifications
See Annex A for detailed technical requirements.

#### Order and Payment Terms
* Orders will be issued on an "as & when requested" basis from the date of issuance of the Standing Offer.
* Estimated quantities per year are 75,000 pairs.
* The contract will be valid for a period of one (1) year, with possible extensions for two (2) additional one-year period.

#### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity
* This tender is open to suppliers who are certified under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The delivery region is Laval, Quebec.

#### Related Documents and Attachments
See the notice URL for all related documents and attachments.
